function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Younger people vulnerable to mental health issues due to enhanced access to social media information and stress from online education.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to mental health issues during quarantine.","Mitigation":"Limiting exposure to social media, providing mental health support for online education stress.","Technologies":"Usage monitoring and parental controls for social media, online mental health resources for students.","People":"Younger people, students.","Owner":"Parents, educational institutions."},{"Description":"Negative impact on sleep quality during COVID-19 outbreak, with a link to mental health issues.","Impact":"Potential worsening of mental health due to impaired sleep quality.","Mitigation":"Introducing strategies for improving sleep quality, such as relaxation techniques and sleep hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Sleep tracking apps, relaxation and meditation apps.","People":"General population.","Owner":"Health organizations, individuals."},{"Description":"Methodological limitations in previous studies, including non-representative sample selection and underrepresentation of certain demographics.","Impact":"Risk of drawing inaccurate conclusions about the impact of COVID-19 on mental health.","Mitigation":"Conducting future studies with greater methodological rigor and representative sample selection.","Technologies":"Advanced sampling techniques, online survey tools targeting diverse demographics.","People":"Research organizations, academic institutions.","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions."}]}
